name: Surge
description: You play as the brilliant Dr Lazarus. The newest energy source, Infinium, is used everywhere & threatens your memory. With Galatea by your side, hook & fling yourself with your mechanical arm, unlock new abilities, fight powerful bosses and stop Infinium’s progression before it’s too late!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 480 or AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: GAMEPAD REQUIRED (XBOX PREFERED).
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 480 or AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: GAMEPAD REQUIRED (XBOX PREFERED).
